title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. I, pt. 127 - Safety Hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. I, pt. 127 - Safety Hearings

State Regulations
§ 127.1 - Notice of hearing; answers
§ 127.2 - Time and place of hearing
§ 127.3 - Suspensions pending hearing
§ 127.4 - Appearances
§ 127.5 - Conduct of hearings; recusal
§ 127.6 - Evidence; discovery
§ 127.7 - Adjournments
§ 127.8 - Failure to appear; waiver
§ 127.9 - Chemical test refusal hearings
§ 127.10 - Decisions
§ 127.11 - Effect of other laws
§ 127.12 - Appeals
§ 127.13 - Adjudicatory proceedings
§ 127.14 - Non-payment of tolls

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. I, pt. 127

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 215, 215[a] 225[3], 398-f[1][b], 415[9-a], 469-a[1], [2], 471-a, 510[3] 1194-a, 1194[2][c], [e]; State Administrative Procedure Act, §
301-3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
